thig14.1:8.4: ramāma supupphite → ramāmase pupphite (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed); ramāmase
thig14.1:13.2: Yadi viharemase → yadi viharemasi (pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed); yadipi viharesi (mr)
